dcterms:creator: A. Shandilya
K. Ghosh
S. Ghosh
dcterms:description: A dataset containing tweets about the effects of the drug Claritin, annotated with the gender of the user who posted it, used to evaluate gender fairness.
dcterms:title: Claritin

dcterms:creator: A. Shandilya
K. Ghosh
S. Ghosh
dcterms:description: A dataset containing tweets posted during the 2016 US Presidential election, annotated as supporting or attacking one of the presidential candidates or neutral, used to evaluate political fairness.
dcterms:title: US Election

dcterms:creator: A. Bražinskas
M. Lapata
I. Titov
dcterms:description: A dataset containing product reviews from Yelp, used to conduct sentiment fairness analysis, with sentiment labels indicating positive, neutral, or negative sentiments.
dcterms:title: Yelp

dcterms:creator: A. Bražinskas
M. Lapata
I. Titov
dcterms:description: A dataset containing product reviews from Amazon, used to conduct opinion fairness analysis, with ratings from 1 to 5 indicating the reviewer's rating.
dcterms:title: Amazon

dcterms:creator: C. Danescu-Niculescu-Mizil
L. Lee
B. Pang
J. Kleinberg
dcterms:description: A dataset containing conversations from the U.S. Supreme Court Oral Arguments, used to analyze the fairness of speakers in court transcripts.
dcterms:title: SupremeCourt

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
A. Fabbri
D. Radev
dcterms:description: A dataset collecting public debates that follow the Oxford style, used to analyze the fairness of speakers in debates.
dcterms:title: Intelligence Squared Debate (IQ2)
